statements: DELETE FROM pesticide_and_herbicide_usage WHERE id = 1 AND drone_id = 1001
DELETE FROM pesticide_and_herbicide_usage WHERE herbicide_name = 'Roundup' AND usage_amount > 50

DELETE FROM drone_data WHERE location = 'Field A';
DELETE FROM Recommendations WHERE HerbicideID = 5 AND RecommendationDate = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM pesticide_usage WHERE pesticide_name = 'HerbX' AND usage_date < '2021-09-01';
DELETE FROM herbicide_usage WHERE quantity_used < 100 AND drone_recommendation_id = 5;
